TRANSFER_MSG: Use the teleporter to navigate to the Fiery Volcano?Ă
BARRIER_MSG: A mysterious barrier prevents you from going any further...
DONT_USE_TELEPORTER_010: The Transfer Device is not active. It cannot be used at this time.
RENATE_MSG:
̂ȁ, you must head to the deepest reaches within the Core. It's essentially the central nervous system.
ā
Once in that room, I can unleash the antibody I've created to purify Mother.
ā
Please, you must clear a path for me to that room... I believe in you!
AROMA_MSG:
̂You've got to get to the deepest reaches, just like
last time. Lenate should be waiting inside!
NPC_RENATE_REC: ̄She was once Anses's main partner. Now she's the overseer of the underground Resistance lab for Anses clones.
NPC_AROMA_REC: ̄A girl that was impersonating Lucia. She is a rather intelligent, beautiful, young apprentice scientist.
REC_POINT_TRANSFER_020: ̄Activating this terminal will allow you to make a quick escape from the Core.
REC_POINT_01_02:
̄Attuning to this Zoom Stone will add it to your destination list.
These stones appear in various places around the world.
